title: Where can I find copyright-free background music for my YouTube videos without credit for anyone? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can check out the Library of Congress for free music. You can also procure free music (with attributions) at Free Music Archive. You can also get commercial use allowed music on Free Music Archive.

There are many channels that provide copyright free music. You just got to google. Besides you tube also has its own music which is copyright free and can be used for your videos. There will be a tab in YouTube studio. Check it out.
